data.message:
Ems fans "Please Marshall please let me suck your cock" smh. Em know he has you by your balls.

 "DJ's playing them hits Oh, this my jam, this my shit We don't know a word to a verse, All we know is the chorus 'Cause the chorus repeats the same four words for us And the songs ginormous, the whole formula's switched 'Cause we don't know anymore, what are hits Is it the beat, is it the rap? Is it a finger snap or the same 808 clap? And how do we adapt and get TRL votes When 13 year olds control the remote"
